amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Community Oriented Policing Services program by $476.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the Community Oriented Policing Services (COPS) program by $467,574,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 236 (Roll no. 341).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Weiner.
